mapper.insert: insert into xm_order (user_phone, order_sn, tot_price, pay_price, freight_price, promotion_price, coupon_price, pay_type, `status`, user_address_info, creat_time, pay_time, delivery_time, recv_time, comment_time, refund_time, die_time) values (#{userPhone}, #{orderSn}, #{totPrice}, #{payPrice}, #{freightPrice}, #{promotionPrice}, #{couponPrice}, #{payType}, #{status}, #{userAddressInfo}, #{creat_time}, #{pay_time}, #{delivery_time}, #{recv_time}, #{comment_time}, #{refund_time}, #{die_time})
insert into xm_order_item (order_sn, product_id, `name`, current_price, price, `count`) values (#{orderSn}, #{productId}, #{name}, #{currentPrice}, #{price}, #{count})
insert into xm_order_refund_form (order_sn, user_phone, `creat_time`, refund_price, handle_time, `status`) values (#{orderSn}, #{userPhone}, #{creatTime}, #{refundPrice}, #{handleTime}, #{status})
